docs.summary:
The wix-crm-backend module contains functionality for working with
 your site's [workflows](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-workflows)
 from backend code.
description: To use the CRM API, import `wixCrm` from the `wix-crm-backend` module:
```javascript
import wixCrm from 'wix-crm-backend';

params.name: id
params.doc: ID of the card to archive.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the card has been archived.

docs.summary: Archives a workflow card.
description: The `archiveCard()` function returns a Promise that resolves when the
card has been archived.

examples.title: Archive a card
body: // Returns a promise that resolves to void.

params.name: workflowId
params.doc: ID of the workflow to create the card in.

params.name: phaseId
params.doc: ID of the phase to create the card in.

params.name: card
params.doc: The data required for card creation.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - ID of the newly created card.

docs.summary: Creates a new workflow card.
description: The `createCard()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the created card
ID when the card is created in the specified workflow phase.

examples.title: Create a card
body: // Returns a promise that resolves to:

params.doc: ID of the workflow to create the phase in.

params.name: phaseInfo
params.doc: The data to use when creating the phase.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - ID of the newly created phase.

docs.summary: Creates a new workflow phase.
description: The `createPhase()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the created phase
ID when the phase is created in the specified workflow.

body: // Returns a promise that resolves to:

params.name: workflow
params.doc: The data required for workflow creation.

ret.doc:
Fulfilled - Id of the ne workflow.
Rejected - Error message.

docs.summary: Creates a new workflow.
description: The `createWorkflow()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the created workflow
ID.

params.name: id
params.doc: ID of the card to delete.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the card has been deleted.

docs.summary: Delete a workflow card by ID.
description: The `deleteCard()` function returns a Promise when the specified card
has been deleted.

examples.title: Delete a card
body: // Returns a promise that resolves to void.

params.doc: ID of the phase to delete.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the phase has been deleted.

description: The `deletePhase()` function returns a Promise when the specified phase
has been deleted.

body: // Returns a promise that resolves to void.

params.name: id
params.doc: ID of the workflow to delete.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the workflow has been deleted.

docs.summary: Deletes a workflow by ID.
description: The `deleteWorkflow()` function returns a Promise when the specified workflow
has been deleted.

body: // Returns a promise that resolves to void.

params.name: id
params.doc: ID of the card to get.

ret.doc:
Fulfilled - The card with the given ID.
Rejected - Error message.

docs.summary: Gets a workflow card by ID.
description: The `getCard()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the card
with the specified ID.

params.doc: ID of the phase to get.

description: The `getPhase()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the phase
with the specified ID.

docs.summary: Gets a workflow by ID.
description: The `getWorkflow()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the workflow
with the specified ID.

examples.title: Get a workflow
body: /* Returns a promise that resolves to:

params.name: workflowId
params.doc: ID of the workflow to retrieve cards from.

params.name: options
params.doc: Options to use when getting the list of cards.

docs.summary: Gets a list of a workflow's cards.
description: The `listCards()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a list of the
the specified workflow's cards.
Use the `options` parameter to specify which cards to retrieve.
Pass an empty object to the `options` parameter to retrieve a list of all the
workflow's non-archived cards.

examples.title: Get a list of cards
body: /* Returns a promise that resolves to:

params.name: workflowId
params.doc: ID of the workflow to retrieve phases from.

params.name: options
params.doc: Options to use when getting the list of phases.

docs.summary: Gets a list of a workflow's phases.
description: The `listPhases()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a list of the
the specified workflow's phases.
Use the `options` parameter to specify which phases to retrieve.
Pass an empty object to the `options` parameter to retrieve a list of all the
workflow's phases.

examples.title: Get a list of phases
body: /* Returns a promise that resolves to:

params.name: options
params.doc: Options to use when getting the list of workflows.

docs.summary: Gets a list of the site's workflows.
description: The `listWorkflows()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a list of the
site's workflows.
Use the `options` parameter to specify which workflows to retrieve.
Pass an empty object to the `options` parameter to retrieve a list of all the
site's workflows.

examples.title: Get a list of workflows
body: /* Returns a promise that resolves to:

params.name: options
params.doc: Information about where to move the card.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the card has moved.

docs.summary: Moves a card to a new position with a workflow.
description: The `moveCard()` function returns a Promise when the specified card
has been moved to the new position.
Use the [`moveCardOptions`](#moveCardOptions) parameter to specify the phase
and position within that phase to move the card to. Positions are zero-based,
meaning the first position is `0`.

examples.title: Move a card
body: // Returns a promise that resolves to void.

params.name: options
params.doc: Information about where to move the phase.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the phase has moved.

docs.summary: Moves a phase to a new position with a workflow.
description: The `movePhase()` function returns a Promise when the specified phase
has been moved to the new position.
Use the [`movePhaseOptions`](#movePhaseOptions) parameter to specify the new phase
position. The phase can be moved to any non-win position. Positions are zero-based,
meaning the first position is `0`.

examples.title: Move a phase
body: // Returns a promise that resolves to void.

params.name: options
params.doc: Information about where to restore the card.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the card has been restored.

docs.summary: Restores an archived workflow card.
description: The `restoreCard()` function returns a Promise that resolves when the
archived card has been restored.

examples.title: Restore a card
body: // Returns a promise that resolves to void

params.name: id
params.doc: ID of the card to update.

params.name: cardInfo
params.doc: The information to update the card with.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the card has been updated.

docs.summary: Updates an existing workflow card.
description: The `updateCardFields()` function returns a Promise that resolves when the
card has been updated with the specified values.
Only the properties passed in the [`CardInfo`](#CardInfo) object will be
updated. All other properties will remain the same.

examples.title: Update a card
body: // Returns a promise that resolves to void

params.name: id
params.doc: ID of the phase to update.

params.name: phaseInfo
params.doc: The information to update the workflow phase with.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the phase has been updated.

docs.summary: Updates an existing workflow phase.
description: The `updatePhaseFields()` function returns a Promise that resolves when the
phase has been updated with the specified values.
Only the properties passed in the [`PhaseInfo`](#PhaseInfo) object will be
updated. All other properties will remain the same.

examples.title: Update a phase
body: // Returns a promise that resolves to void.

params.name: id
params.doc: ID of workflow to update.

params.name: workflowInfo
params.doc: The information to update the workflow with.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the workflow has been updated.

docs.summary: Updates an existing workflow.
description: The `updateWorkflowFields()` function returns a Promise that resolves when the
workflow has been updated with the specified values.
Only the properties passed in the [`WorkflowInfo`](#WorkflowInfo) object will be
updated. All other properties will remain the same.

examples.title: Update a workflow
body: // Returns a promise that resolves to void.

docs.summary: An object representing a workflow card.
An object containing information about a card.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: ID of the contact associated with the card.

docs.summary: An object containing a list of cards.
An object containing a list of workflow cards.
An object contains ListCards request data.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Maximum number of cards to retrieve. Defaults to `0`, meaning no limit.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of cards to skip before the retrieved items. Defaults to `0`.

members.name: order
members.doc:
Sort order. List of field:direction pairs, where direction is either `"asc"`
 or `"desc"`. For example. `["createdAt:desc","name:asc"]`.

members.name: phaseId
members.doc: ID of phase to retrieve cards from. If omitted, will retrieve cards from all phases.

members.name: fetchDeleted
members.doc: Whether to retrieve only deleted cards.

docs.summary: An object contains ListCards request data.

members.name: limit
members.doc: optional - limit (default is 0, meaning no limit).

members.name: offset
members.doc: optional - for paging - how many records to skip (default is 0).

members.name: order
members.doc: optional - sort order - list of field:direction tupples. e.g. name:asc.

members.name: phaseId
members.doc: an optional filter by a unique id of the phase in context.

members.name: fetchDeleted
members.doc: an optional filter to ask for deleted cards only.

docs.summary: An object contains ListCards response.
An object containing options used when requesting a list of workflows.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Maximum number of items to retrieve. Defaults to `0`, meaning no limit.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip before the retrieved items. Defaults to `0`.

members.name: order
members.doc:
Sort order. List of field:direction pairs, where direction is either `"asc"`
 or `"desc"`. For example. `["createdAt:desc","name:asc"]`.

docs.summary: An object contains ListPhases response.
An object contains list options request data.

members.name: limit
members.doc: optional - limit (default is 0, meaning no limit).

members.name: offset
members.doc: optional - for paging - how many records to skip (default is 0).

members.name: order
members.doc: optional - sort order - list of field:direction tupples. e.g. name:asc.

docs.summary: An object contains ListWorkflows response.
An object contains moveCard request data.

members.name: id
members.doc: Id of the card to move.

members.name: newPhaseId
members.doc: ID of the phase to move to. Defaults to the cards current phase.

members.name: newPosition
members.doc: Zero-based position to move the phase card to. Defaults to `0`.

docs.summary: An object contains moveCard request data.

members.name: newPhaseId
members.doc: Unique phase identifier, stay in the same phase by default .

members.name: newPosition
members.doc: new position in the new phase, goes to top by default.

docs.summary: An object containing options used when moving a phase.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the phase to move.

members.name: newPosition
members.doc: Zero-based position to move the phase to.

docs.summary: An object contains MovePhase request data.

members.name: newPosition
members.doc: new phase position among other phases.

docs.summary: An object contains pagination information.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of workflows to skipped before the retrieving the workflows.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of workflows in the site.

docs.summary: An object representing a workflow phase.

members.name: cardsList
members.doc: List of cards in a phase.

docs.summary: An object containing information about a phase.
An object containing a list of phases.
An object containing a list of workflow phases.

members.name: total
members.doc: Number of phases, excluding the win phase.

docs.summary: An object representing a workflow.

members.name: phasesList
members.doc: List of phases, excluding the win phase.

members.name: winPhase
members.doc: Information about the win phase, which is the completion phase.

docs.summary: An object containing information about a workflow.
An object containing a list of workflows.
